statements: SELECT * FROM DancePerformance WHERE performance_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT performer_name, venue_name, ticket_price FROM DancePerformance WHERE performer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT venue_name, performance_date FROM DancePerformance ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT performer_name, ticket_price FROM DancePerformance WHERE ticket_price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM DancePerformance WHERE venue_name LIKE '%Theatre%';
SELECT * FROM DancePerformance WHERE performance_date = '2022-10-10';
SELECT performer_name, venue_name, ticket_price FROM DancePerformance WHERE performance_id = 1001;
SELECT venue_name, ticket_price FROM DancePerformance WHERE performer_name LIKE '%Alice%';
SELECT * FROM DancePerformance ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(ticket_price) AS max_price, MIN(ticket_price) AS min_price FROM DancePerformance;
SELECT * FROM Dance_Performances;
SELECT performer_name, venue, date FROM Dance_Performances ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT performer_name, performer_id, email FROM Performers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Dance_Performances WHERE ticket_sales > 100;
SELECT performer_name, venue, ticket_sales FROM Dance_Performances WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Dance_Performances WHERE venue = 'Theater A' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT performer_name, ticket_sales FROM Dance_Performances WHERE ticket_sales > 1000 ORDER BY ticket_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM Performers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT performer_name, venue FROM Dance_Performances WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY performer_name ASC;
SELECT performer_name, phone_number FROM Performers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY performer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM dance_dates
SELECT venue_name, location FROM dance_venues
SELECT performer_name, skill_level FROM dance_performers
SELECT date_id, performance_date FROM dance_dates ORDER BY performance_date DESC
SELECT venue_name, location FROM dance_venues WHERE venue_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM dance_dates WHERE date_id = 1;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM dance_venues WHERE venue_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT performer_name, skill_level FROM dance_performers WHERE skill_level = 'Advanced' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM dance_dates JOIN dance_venues ON dance_dates.date_id = dance_venues.venue_id;
SELECT performer_name, venue_name FROM dance_performers JOIN dance_venues ON dance_performers.performer_id = dance_venues.venue_id WHERE skill_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT * FROM dance_performance_dates;
SELECT venue_id, venue_name FROM performance_venues ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT performer_name, performer_type FROM performers WHERE performer_type = 'Dancer';
SELECT transaction_id, ticket_price, number_of_tickets FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price >= 50;
SELECT performer_name, performance_date FROM performers JOIN dance_performance_dates ON performers.performer_id = dance_performance_dates.date_id ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM dance_performance_dates WHERE date_id > 5;
SELECT performer_name, performer_type FROM performers WHERE performer_type = 'Dancer';
SELECT venue_name FROM performance_venues ORDER BY venue_id DESC;
SELECT ticket_price, number_of_tickets FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50.00;
SELECT performer_name, performer_type, venue_name FROM performers p JOIN performance_venues v ON p.performer_id = v.venue_id;
SELECT * FROM Dates;
SELECT venue_name, venue_address FROM Venues;
SELECT performer_name, performer_type FROM Performers WHERE performer_type = 'Musician';
SELECT date_id, performance_date FROM Dates ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_price > 100 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Dates WHERE date_id = 1;
SELECT performer_name, performer_type FROM Performers WHERE performer_type = 'Singer';
SELECT venue_name, venue_address FROM Venues ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT performer_name, ticket_price FROM Performers JOIN TicketSales ON Performers.performer_id = TicketSales.performer_id WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Performances WHERE date_id = 2 AND venue_id = 3;
